document.full_text: the toll from a major tornado on sunday in joplin, missouri has risen to 89 confirmed deaths, local officials said in a televised press conference early on monday.
document.title: joplin, missouri tornado death toll hits 89: officials
lines_and_colors: the toll from a major tornado on sunday in joplin, missouri has risen to 89 confirmed deaths, local officials said in a televised press conference early on monday.
